messages.subject: Takayama Ukon's Kamon
messages.msgSnippet: During university, I did some research on the Christian Daimyo Takayama Ukon.  I couldn t find much information on what his kamon was.  Does anyone have
messages.messageBody:
During university, I did some research on the Christian Daimyo
Takayama Ukon. I couldn't find much information on what his kamon
was. Does anyone have information concerning his family crest.
I've seen one circle (star) encircled by six other circles, and a
variation of this with rings instead of circles representing shadows
of stars.

Brian
